accountCreatedPopupText: You can backup your phrase later
termsDisclaimer: By using this app you agree to our
restoreMnemonicInstructions: This page allows you to restore a previously exported mnemonic backup. In order to do so, please insert below your mnenonic backup text and the password you used to encrypt it. Then press the below button to proceed.
restoreBackupFieldHint: Your backup here (it should end with an =)
recoverAccountInstructions: Please enter your mnemonic phrase in order and make sure your mnemonic is written correctly
recoverAccountInvalidMnemonic: This mnemonic does not seem valid. Please check it again.
biometricsBody: Please note that the biometric authentication will be paired only to this device and any fingerprint or face that has been set to unlock your device can be used to access your account on this application
passwordBody: Due to security reasons, we require you to input a password if you will ever want to recover your mnemonic phrase from within the application later on. Please note that if you lose this password you will be required to enter your mnemonic from scratch in the case of a future recovery.
securityLoginText: In order to prevent any unwanted access to your mnemonic phrase, you are required to log in using the authentication method you have previously set during the the first login into the app.
securityLoginWarning: Please note that your mnemonic should never be shown to anyone, and you should see it only once when backing it up on a piece of paper. Allowing anyone to see your mnemonic will most surely end in them stealing your account and all your funds so proceed with caution.
securityLoginBiometrics: If you understand the risks of viewing your mnemonic, please select the checkbox below and tap the button to start the authentication process.
securityLoginPassword: If you understand the risks of viewing your mnemonic, please select the checkbox below, insert your password and press the button to view it.
understoodMnemonicDisclaimer: I understand the consequences of viewing my mnemonic.
exportMnemonicDialogText: In order to export your mnemonic properly, we need a password with which it will be encrypted for security reasons. Please insert below such passwords that you will also be required later when importing it.
mnemonicExportScreenText: Following is your mnemonic encrypted data. You can export this data whenever you want, even sending it to a friend of yours for backup, if you have used a strong enough password. If you would like to share it somewhere, click on the Share button below
mnemonicExportShareText: Hey, here is my encrypted mnemonic for Mooncake! Please keep it safe!
refreshButtonText: New posts available. Tap to refresh
noPostsYet: Looks a little empty here. How about adding some content?
blockDialogTextTwo: you will no longer see their posts. Would you like to continue?
syncErrorDesc: An error has verified when syncing the posts to the chain:
syncSuccessBodyTwo: has been sent to the chain
createPostEnableCommentsButtonHint: Comments to this post will be disabled. Tap to enable them
createPostDisableCommentsButtonHint: Comments to this post will be enabled. Tap to disable them
cameraTip: Take a picture using the camera
galleryTip: Select an image from the gallery
savingPostPopupBody: The post will now be synced to the chain. This might take a while
pollQuestionHint: What do you want to ask?
noNotifications: No notifications here, you're all done! ðŸŽ‰
accountPageTitle: Welcome to your future account page
accountPageText: We do not support accounts yet, but you can always click on the wallet option inside the app bar to visualize your wallet
saveAccountErrorPopupBody: An error has verified while saving your account. Please try later.
chooseImageSourceTitle: Choose where to pick the image from
errorDTagInvalid: DTag must be 3 - 20 characters lsong and contain only [a-z 0-9 _]
walletBodyText: We do not support transactions history yet, but you can always see the current amount of tokens you own on the top of the page
emptyWalletBody: You don't have any token yet. Ask someone to send you some, or request them using our faucet to see them here.
commentsDisabled: Comments disabled by the post owner
noCommentsYet: Currently there are no comments to this post yet. Be the first to add one!
noReactionsYet: Currently there are no reactions to this post yet. Be the first to add one!
mnemonicBackupBody2: Glad to see you here, One of the most important steps you can take to secure your account is to backup your Mnemonic Phrase.
mnemonicDoNotShowAgainButton: Do not show this popup again
mnemonicViewBody1: Please write down and save your mnemonic phrase, It's the
mnemonicWrittenConfirmation: We'll confirm on the next screen
postUploadError: The following post(s) below could not be uploaded. Please try again later.
